definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[שְׁבִיעִית]] Jos 6:16 +, Ex 23:11 +, [[שְׁבִעִת]] Ex 21:2 [[עִית]]- 1Ki 18:44, 2Ch 23:1;—fifth, esp. P; always c. art.:

definitions.title: 1. m.
definitions.body: 7th day Ge 2:3 + 47 t.; month ([[חׂדֶשׁ]]) Ge 8:4 + 23 t. + (n. om.) Ez Eze 45:25 + 3 t.; lot ([[הַגּוֹרָל]]) Jos 19:40 + (n. om.) 1Ch 24:10, 1Ch 25:14; n. om. also 1Ch 2:15, 1Ch 26:3, 1Ch 26:5 (son), 1Ch 12:11 (man), 1Ch 27:10 (captain).

definitions.title: 2. f.
definitions.body: 7th year, 2Ki 11:4 + 7 t. + (n. om.) Ex 21:2, Ex 23:11, also [[שְׁנַת הַשְּׁבִיעִית]] (Ges:§ 134 p) Ezr 7:8 sabbath Le 23:16; time ([[פַּעַם]]) Jos 6:16 + (n. om.) 1Ki 18:44.
